titleStmt.title: Decimarum et oblationum tabula. = A tithing table Or Table of tithes and oblations, according to the Kings ecclesiasticall lawes and ordinances established in the Church of England: now newly reduced into a booke. Contayning as well the very letter of the law vnder which these rights be seuerally comprised, together with such questions of tything, and their resolutions by the lawes canon, ciuill, and approued doctors opinions of the same, as be ordinarily moued, and which doe often proue to controuersies heerein: as also a briefe and summarie declaration of composition, transaction, custome, prescription, priuilege; and how they preuaile in tything. Compiled by W.C. Bach. of the Civill Lavv.
Tithes and oblations according to the lawes established in the Church of England
titleStmt.author: W. C., Bachelor of the Civil Law.
Clark, William, Bachelor of the civil law, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: W.C. = William Clark? Also erroneously attributed to William Crashaw.
A revision of: Tithes and oblations according to the lawes established in the Church of England.
Identified as STC 6012 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
